scripts.ipad: runIos(){ export ENVFILE=.env.$1 && cd ios && pod repo update && pod install && cd .. && chmod -R 777 ios/Pods/ && react-native run-ios --simulator "iPad Air 2";};runIos
scripts.cleanAndroid: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf android/build
scripts.restart: ps aux | grep "[r]eact-native" | awk {'print $2'} | xargs kill -9 && npm start --reset-cache &
scripts.setup-all: npm run get-assets && export PLATFORM=ios && npm run setup-files && npm run get-build-config && npm run apply-build-config && export PLATFORM=android && npm run setup-files
scripts.kill-process: ps aux | grep "[r]eact-native" | awk {'print $2'} | xargs kill -9
scripts.build-android: buildAndroid(){ export ENVFILE=$1 && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/build/generated/res/react/release/raw && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..; };buildAndroid
scripts.build-ios: a(){ export ENVFILE=$2 && cd ios && pod repo update && pod install && xcodebuild archive -workspace Sirius.xcworkspace -scheme Sirius -configuration Debug -archivePath build/$1.xcarchive && cd ..; };a
scripts.build-sign-ios: a(){ export ENVFILE=$2 && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm Podfile.lock && pod repo update && pod install && xcodebuild clean -workspace Sirius.xcworkspace -scheme Sirius && sleep 5 && node ../buildScripts/replacePodfilePaths.js && xcodebuild archive -workspace Sirius.xcworkspace -scheme Sirius -configuration Release -archivePath build/$1.xcarchive -UseModernBuildSystem=NO && sleep 5 && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath build/$1.xcarchive -exportPath build/ -exportOptionsPlist Sirius/ExportOptions.plist -UseModernBuildSystem=NO CODE_SIGN_STYLE="Manual" && mv ./build/Sirius.ipa ./build/$1.ipa && cd ..; };a
scripts.android: runAndroid(){ export ENVFILE=$1 && npm run build-android && react-native run-android --variant release;};runAndroid
scripts.ios: runIos(){ export ENVFILE=$1 && cd ios && pod repo update && pod install && cd .. && chmod -R 777 ios/Pods/ && react-native run-ios;};runIos
scripts.start-ios: a(){ export ENVTYPE=$2 && export APP_ID=$1 && npm run get-assets && export PLATFORM=ios && npm run setup-files && npm run apply-build-config && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm Podfile.lock && pod install && cd .. && react-native run-ios; };a
scripts.start-android: a(){ export ENVTYPE=$2 && export APP_ID=$1 && npm run get-assets && export PLATFORM=android && npm run setup-files && cd buildScripts && cd .. && npm run apply-build-config && react-native run-android; };a
